author: Matthew J. Belvedere
title: 5 things to know before the stock market opens Friday
description: The Dow is set to surge Friday on a report that said Gilead Sciences' drug Remdesivir showed effectiveness in treating Covid-19.
content:
1. Dow set to surge after a coronavirus drug reportedly shows effectiveness
U.S. stock futures were pointing to an over 700-point gain for the Dow Jones Industrial Average at Friday's open. While off the overnight highs of more than 900 points, the Dow was s… [+4586 chars]
